Posts.Content: Jul 17, 2014 07:09PM miss_sunshine wrote: Julianna, I have an appointment booked with my surgeon next Wednesday July 23rd. The area is about the same in terms of swelling and redness. It is not warm and I don't have a fever. I don't think I overdid anything because I haven't done anything. Just the same, maybe I just need to get more rest. Will call the surgeon's office in the morning.
Posts.Title: Post-mastectomy pain miss_sunshine juliaanna
